Detailed Description

Base class for a set of bricks that form a single shader.

This class holds a root brick and handles tracing that root brick through its children to form a RSL shader. A root brick is any brick that does not have a DzBrickSet::ShaderType of NONE. This class should only be constructed by classes that implement IDzBrickUser.

See also:
DzShaderBrick,IDzBrickUser

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzBrickSet::LightType

For sets of type Light, this indicates the light type.

Enumerator:
NullLight 

A null light.

AmbientLight 

An ambient light.

PointLight 

A point light.

DistantLight 

A distance light.

SpotLight 

A spotLight light.

enum DzBrickSet::ShaderType

The shader type for a shader brick in the set.

Enumerator:
None 

A function, non-root, brick. Most bricks should be this type.

Surface 

A root brick of the RSL type surface, handed to a DiSurface call

Light 

A root brick of the RSL type light, handed to a DiLightSource call

LightArea 

A root brick of the RSL type light, handed to a DiAreaLightSource call

VolumeAtmosphere 

A root brick of the RSL type volume, handed to a DiAtmosphere call

VolumeInterior 

A root brick of the RSL type volume, handed to a DiInterior call

VolumeExterior 

A root brick of the RSL type volume, handed to a DiExterior call

Note:
3Delight does not support DiExterior
Displacement 

A root brick of the RSL type displacement, handed to a DiDisplacement call

Imager 

A root brick of the RSL type imager, handed to a DiImager call

)
Parameters:
rootBrick must be a brick type other than DzBrickSet::None

Note:
only IDzBrickUser classes should construct DzBrickSet.
